title: The Fairy Rebel
description: The Fairy Queen strictly forbids fairies from using their magic power on humans. But after Tiki accidentally meets Jan, a woman who is desperate for a baby daughter, she finds it impossible to resist fulfilling her wish. Now up against the dark and vicious power of evil, this fairy rebel must face the Queenâ€™s fury with frightening and possibly fatal results.
author: Lynne Reid Banks
